(2) | team2score2 = 1
(4) | date2 = July 15, 2005 | stadium2 = [[Samen Al-Aeme Stadium]] | city2 = [[Mashhad]] | attendance2 = 35,000 | referee2 = [[Masoud Moradi]] | previous = [[2004 Hazfi Cup Final|2004]] | next = [[2006 Hazfi Cup Final|2006]] }} The '''2005 Hazfi Cup Final''' was a [[Two-legged tie|two-legged]] [[association football|football]] tie in order to determine the 2004â05 Hazfi Cup champion of [[Iran]]ian football clubs. [[F.C. Aboomoslem|Aboomoslem]] faced [[Saba Battery F.C.|Saba]] in this final game.. The first leg took place on July 12, 2005 at [[Saba City Stadium]] in [[Tehran]] and the second leg took place on July 15, 2005 at [[Samen Al-Aeme Stadium]], [[Mashhad]]. == Format == The rules for the final were exactly the same as the one in the previous knockout rounds. The tie was contested over two legs with [[Away goals rule|away goals]] deciding the winner if the two teams were level on goals after the second leg. If the teams could still not be separated at that stage, then [[extra time]] would have been played with a [[Penalty shootout (association football)|penalty shootout]] (taking place if the teams were still level after extra time). == Route to the final == {{details|2004â05 Hazfi Cup}} {| style="width:100%; text-align:center;" |- style="vertical-align:top; background:#9cf;" !colspan=4 style="width:1*"|Saba !Round !colspan=4 style="width:1*"|Aboomoslem |-style="vertical-align:top; background:#c1e0ff;" |Opponent |Result |H/A |Saba goalscorers ||Second stage |Opponent |Result |H/A |Aboomoslem goalscorers |- | ? | ? | ? | ? | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|1/16 Final | ? | ? | ? | ? |- | [[Malavan F.C.|Malavan]] | 1–0 | H | ? | style="background:#c1e0ff;"| 1/8 Final | [[Persepolis F.C.|Persepolis]] | 1–0 | A | ? |- | [[PAS Tehran F.C.|PAS Tehran]] | 4–2 | H | ? | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Quarter-Final | [[Paykan F.C.|Paykan]] | 1–0 | H | ? |- | [[Esteghlal Ahvaz F.C.|Esteghlal Ahvaz]] | 4–4 (6-5) | H | ? | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Semi-Final | [[Saba Qom F.C.|Saba Batri]] | 0–0 (6-7) | A | ? |} == Final Summary == {{TwoLeg start}} {{TwoLegResult| '''[[Saba Battery F.C.|Saba]]''' || 2-2 | [[F.C.
